user_story: As a freelancer with variable income, I want the banking system to offer flexible account options, customizable notifications about transactions, real-time reporting of my balance, and the ability to categorize my expenses so that I can manage my finances more effectively and have a better understanding of my cash flow.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall offer multiple account options tailored to freelancers with variable income.
2. The system shall provide real-time balance reporting for user accounts.
3. The system shall allow users to categorize their expenses for better financial management.
4. The system shall enable users to receive customizable notifications about transactions.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall offer multiple account options tailored to freelancers with variable income.
2. The system shall provide real-time balance reporting for user accounts.
3. The system shall allow users to categorize their expenses for better financial management.
4. The system shall enable users to receive customizable notifications about transactions.
